trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SecurityTokenReceived" /> event.
The event is raised when an issued token is received from the security token service (STS) during sign-in using WS-Federation.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트가 보안 토큰 서비스 (STS)에서 발급된 된 토큰을 받으면 중 Ws-federation을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: It is raised before the token is validated.
trans-unit.target: 토큰의 유효성을 검사 하기 전에 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can access the issued token through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A> property and modify its properties or replace it.
trans-unit.target: 통해 발급 된 토큰에 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A> 속성 및 해당 속성을 수정 하거나 바꿉니다.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel sign-in processing by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 로그인 처리를 취소할 수는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs" /> class.
The issued security token.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs" /> class by using the specified security token.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 보안 토큰을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: In the new instance, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A> property is set to the token specified by the `securityToken` parameter and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SignInContext%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스에 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A> 속성으로 지정 된 토큰에는 `securityToken` 매개 변수 및 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SignInContext%2A> 속성이로 설정 된 `null`합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityToken" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The issued security token.
The sign-in context specified in the control.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs" /> class by using the specified security token and sign-in context.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 보안 토큰과 로그인 컨텍스트를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: In the new instance, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A> property is set to the token specified by the `securityToken` parameter and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SignInContext%2A> property is set to the value of the `signInContext` property.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스에 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SecurityToken%2A> 속성으로 지정 된 토큰에는 `securityToken` 매개 변수 및 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.SignInContext%2A> 속성의 값으로 설정 됩니다는 `signInContext` 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityToken" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets the issued security token.
The issued security token.
You can either modify the properties of the issued security token or replace it entirely.
trans-unit.target: 발급 된 보안 토큰의 속성을 수정 하거나 완전히 바꿀 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sign-in context specified in the control.
The sign-in context.
